turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can you order me three minion pizzas with decrust from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: two Hawaiian and one pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, would you like any sides or drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you repeat my order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, you ordered 3 medium thick crust pizzas, 2 hawaiin, and one pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is it ok to place your order for $57?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: just show them your receipt which will be texted to you shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.
